properties.displayName: Potential Network Sniffing Activity Using Network Tools
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where (ProcessCommandLine contains "-i" and FolderPath endswith "\\tshark.exe") or FolderPath endswith "\\windump.exe"

tags.name: description
tags.value:
Detects potential network sniffing via use of network tools such as "tshark", "windump".
Network sniffing refers to using the network interface on a system to monitor or capture information sent over a wired or wireless connection.
An adver
